content:
The operators of the 73rd Maritime Center of the SCO found a building with antennas for FPV drones, a surveillance camera, a ROB station and a complex of remote video surveillance with MUR-M.

About thisreported March 13Forces of special operations of the Armed Forces.

FPV drones were used to destroy the enemy's devices, which accurately destroyed all goals.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat the SCO fighters destroyed "Sunpane", 2 tanks, 3 BBM and 26 invaders.
title: In the Kherson region, the Special Operations Forces destroyed the enemy's equipment
description: This was reported on March 13 by the forces of special operations of the Armed Forces. To destroy devices ...
author: Army Inform
